General.Name: M Grass Ecology and Environment Group Co Ltd
General.Description: M-Grass Ecology And Environment (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the seed industry technology and ecological restoration businesses. It offers sand land and desert management, grassland ecological restoration, mine/slope restoration, soil ecological restoration, ecological landscaping for flower sea/field, turf-based ecological landscape, water-efficient landscaping, research, seed technology, and grassland eco-industry big data center services. The company was formerly known as Inner Mongolia M-Grass Ecology And Environment (Group) Co., Ltd. M-Grass Ecology And Environment (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Hohhot, China.
General.Address: No. 71 West Yindu College Building, Hohhot, China
